dd.daily_settle_id where a.type_code = '1' and a.hosp_code =#{hospCode} and a.crte_time >= date(#{startTime}) and a.crte_time < date(#{endTime}) group by a.id) union (select (select value from sys_parameter sp where sp.code = 'HOSP_INSURE_NATION_INFO' and sp.hosp_code = a.hosp_code limit 1) as yljgdm, a.id as jsdh, a.crte_time, 0 as fjzs, a.total_price as je, dd.num as sfmxts, count(d.id) =#{hospCode}) as fpzzs, (select concat(min(e.start_no),'-',max(e.end_no)) from outin_daily_invoice e where e.daily_id = a.id and e.daily_no =a.daily_no and e.hosp_code =#{hospCode}) as fpd, '1' as VALIDFLAG, a.crte_time as APPETIME, a.crte_time as MODIFYTIME, a.crte_id as MODIFYTCODE, a.crte_name as MODIFYTNAME from outin_daily a left join outin_daily_pay d on a.id = d.daily_id and d.type_code = '0' and d.hosp_code = #{hospCode} left join (select count(d.id)as num, ss.daily_settle_id from outpt_register_settle ss join outpt_register d on d.id = ss.register_id and d.hosp_code = ss.hosp_code and ss.hosp_code = #{hospCode} group by ss.daily_settle_id ) dd on a.id = dd.daily_settle_id where a.type_code = '0' and a.hosp_code =#{hospCode} and a.crte_time >= date(#{startTime}) and a.crte_time
